name: Memory Concentration (itch)
description:
A simple memory matching game based on the classic card game.

Created in the Godot game engine. It dynamically chooses images to create a set used in a memory matching game so each play is different.

By default the game will use all the pictures it has available, however in the settings you can choose a specific deck to use (will impact the cards and the background images).

Game plays a tiny bit little smoother in the standalone file, so if you enjoy I'd recommend playing on that instead of the browser.
